data.message: Hello Facebook!  I have sent a couple private messages to hopefully recover a school page (Shawnee Early Childhoood School).  I am the current administrator and would love to use the page as several people tag our school for special memories.  I am not sure of the account specifics as it was set up several years ago.  I would like to know if there is a way to recover the page so we can acively use it again.  Is there a contact I could speak/chat with to provide information that may be needed to recover that page?

replies.message: Hi Theresa. If the Page is unmanaged, you can request to claim the Page and become its admin. You can learn more here: http://bit.ly/2tzSnIh. -Pri
